div.p: Time-height cross sections of climatological mean temperature differences [K] from 65°N to 90°N (LICE minus HICE) for ERA-Interim reanalysis data ( a), ECHAM6 model simulations ( b) and ECHAM6-SWIFT model simulations ( c). Dashed/solid lines indicate statistical significance at the 95/99% level according to a two-sided students t-test.
